column1: The department supports a small, but well equipped, 'on-site'
electronics workshop, with additional resources available 'off-site'
having acquired more than 20 years experience through their
involvement with the following earth observation and planetary
experiments: ISAMS (on UARS), ATSR1/2 (on ERS1/2), PMIRR1 (on Mars
Observer), PMIRR2 (on Mars Climate Orbiter) EOR (on EURECA) MOPITT (on
Terra), CIRS (on Cassini), and HIRDLS (on Aura).
